SEARCH
Package model

Class Magazine

java.lang.Object
model.BibliographicProduct
model.Magazine
public class Magazine extends BibliographicProduct
The "Magazine" class extends the "BibliographicProduct" class and includes properties such as periodicity and category, as well as methods for setting these properties and generating a random alphanumeric ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • Magazine

      public Magazine(String nameProduct, int numberPages, Calendar publicationDate, String url, double valueProduct, String periodicity, int category)
      Constructor for a Magazine object.
      Parameters:
      nameProduct - the name of the magazine.
      numberPages - the number of pages in the magazine.
      publicationDate - the publication date of the magazine.
      url - the URL of the magazine.
      valueProduct - the value of the magazine.
      periodicity - the periodicity of the magazine.
      category - the category of the magazine (1 for Variety, 2 for Design, 3 for Scientist).
